Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsthere were three lights while i was driving from lenexa to lawrence, ks. one in the distance disappeared. there was one boomerang looking one. another one looked like a meteor falling almost straight towards my car but very slowly with a vertical flame\light. on closer look, its structure was grey but still too small to see the shape. these hung in the sky for at least 10 minutes and then they were behind me. i dont necessarily believe in ufos but these crafts seem to defy normal aircraft behavior and appearance.
Summary: {dr}Three lights hovering. One very slowly falling. One grey craft.
